msbt.message: Hey, did you pick this stuff out yourself? It looks great!Whoa! Check out this sweet ! That is so your style, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is your made out of mushrooms?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />From this angle, it's like it sprouted here Really cool!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your looks cool. Like, literally cool.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You ever get the urge to go ice fishing? Oh! Or play hockey?

<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm digging the minimalist feel you've got going on in here. It's super chill.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I don't think I could work out in here though. I'd be too worried about disturbing the peace!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm getting some big ideas from your .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I've always wanted my own stadium. Maybe I could build one out of wood blocks, ?I can't wait to get started!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Antiques usually aren't my thing, but your looks great!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />If I ever cleaned my place, maybe I'd find my super old gear, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You're making me nostalgic with your .Back in school, running through the halls, the teacher yelling at me Good times, .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />One time a basketball landed on the roof of the gym, but it never came down. I wonder if it's still there

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa! It's like going to a resort! Your is awesome!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />If you don't mind, I'm just going to lay down and work on my tan, maybe watch the surfers, .Hang on! Where are we?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Do you work a lot from home? Just remember to take breaks!I don't think I could spend all day in an office. I'm all play and no work!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your looks like it was a fun project.I love how committed you are to the outdoor look.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> Whenever I see log furniture, I just think caber toss.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I have to be honest, the cute look doesn't do anything for me. Maybe it's great. I'm not a good judge.But I'm a great judge of things that are cool, strong, or have muscles! Sogot anything like that around?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Don't you get hungry seeing there?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I couldn't do it. I eat in my sleep, so I'd wake up without a pillow
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your gives the place a very mature look.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's the perfect place for trophies, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Just being around your makes me feel happy!It reminds me of all the toys I had as a kid. Footballs, hockey pucks, baseballs, a shuttlecock<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I had a lot of fun, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your is made of seashells, right?Does that mean if I listen closely, I'll hear surfers?Huh.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> That's too bad. I don't hear anything, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm surprised how much I love your . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />The material feels super nice!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />There's just something super satisfying about stuff that goes crunch, .Oh! Don't worry. If I wanna crunch , I'll get my own.
